docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: PAUL SIMON has announced that he and 24 South African musicians will perform nine additional ''Graceland '87'' concerts in eight American cities. The proceeds from the concerts, which begin June 15 in Atlanta and end July 2 at Madison Square Garden, are to be divided equally among three classifications of charities.
